title.rendered: “Update on IDF Casualties and Wounded Soldiers in Northern Gaza: Details and Insights”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the name of an IDF Casualty whose message was delivered to his family: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC21022024.15189198

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where they publish and update the details and pictures of the fallen: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, a soldier from Battalion 932, Nahal Brigade and a reservist from Collection Battalion 636, Judea and Samaria Division (877) were severely wounded in combat in the northern Gaza Strip.

Likewise, a soldier from Shaked Battalion from the Givati Brigade was severely wounded in combat in the northern Gaza Strip.

The wounded soldiers were evacuated for medical treatment at the hospital, their families have been updated.
